law.catch_line: No diminishment of court's inherent contempt power -- Exception.
law.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of KRS Chapter 600 to 645, the inherent contempt power of the court shall not be diminished, except that an order of detention for a child found in contempt shall not exceed thirty (30) days.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 25, effective July 1, 2015. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 18, effective July 14, 2000.
